title: ISic000679. I.Sicily inscription 000679
body:
1[pro salute Imp(eratorum) Caes(arum) L(ucii) Septimi Sev]e[ri --- et M(arci) Aureli(i) Antonini e]t · P(ublii) · Septimii · G[etae ---]
2[---]r(es) · p(ublica) · col(oniae) · Aug(ustae) · Ty[ndarit](anorum)
3[p(ecunia) p(ublica)] d(ecreto) d(ecurionum)

1[................................]E[..---..................]T·P·SEPTIMII·G[....---]
2[---]R·P·COL·AUG·TY[......]
3[....]DD

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text: Manganaro 1989 with comp. to photo in Fasolo 2013. Text is a speculative restoration by Manganaro on the parallel of ILS 433

English translation

Alex Antoniou

For the safety of the Imperators and Caesars Lucius Septimius Severus [...] and Marcus Aurelius Antoninus and Publius Septimius Getae [...] The res publica of the colony of Augusta Tindaritani [erected this] with public money, by decree of the decurions

commentary

bibliography

  • 1989.0338f https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283
  • Manganaro 1989 163 no.10 fig.10 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001831
  • Fasolo 2013 74-75 no.8 fig.38 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002011
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
